about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Macpower CNC Machines Ltd is engaged in manufacturing of CNC Turning Centers, Vertical Machining Centers, Horizontal Machining Centers, Cylindrical Grinder, Vertical Turret Lathe, Turn Mill Centers, Drill Tap Center, Twin Spindle VMC and also Multi Tasking, 5-axis along with sub spindle.

Macpower has also offers Robotic Automation integrated with CNC machines. CNC Machining is a process used in the manufacturing sector that involves the use of computers to control machine tools.Company imports various components and parts i.e. Spindle, Ball Screw, Linear Guide ways, Linear Glass Scale, Live Tool Turret, Live Tool Holder, Probe, CNC System from Taiwan, Germany, Japan, Italy etc.

They have catered to over 178 customers with total 213 Machines during the six months ended September 30, 2017 and 236 customers with total 343 Machines in Financial Year 2017 across various sectors like Automobile, Agriculture, Earth Moving Equipment’s, Bearings, General Engineering, Aerospace, Metal, Petroleum, Construction Industries, Defense, PSUs.

contactDetails.full_address: Macpower CNC Machines Ltd, Plot No. 2234, Nr. Krnati Gate, GIDC Metoda Tal Lodhika

faqs.question: What is the Macpower CNC Machines IPO?
faqs.answer:
Macpower CNC Machines IPO is a SME IPO of 2615000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹36.61 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹140 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on March 12, 2018, and closes on March 14, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Macpower CNC Machines IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Macpower CNC Machines IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Macpower CNC Machines IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Macpower CNC Machines IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Macpower CNC Machines IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Macpower CNC Machines IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Macpower CNC Machines IPO opens on March 12, 2018 and closes on March 14, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Macpower CNC Machines IPO?
faqs.answer: Macpower CNC Machines IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Macpower CNC Machines IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Macpower CNC Machines IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
